meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Anna Lawrence Ed Patterson Ben-Hur Flores Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6882.

td.p: Anna Lawrence, a commercial insurance broker from Duluth, Minnesota
Ed Patterson, an attorney from Washington, D.C.
Ben-Hur Flores, a customer service representative from Tampa, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,000)

tr.td: WORLD CAPITAL MUSEUMS
YELLOWSTONE NATIONAL PARK
HODGEPODGE
THAT NBC SHOW WAS FUNNY
TO THE STARS & BEYOND
SOUNDS LIKE A LANGUAGE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The Guinness Storehouse')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The Guinness Storehouse

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Ed: Who is John Muir?)
...
(Alex: Yes. President.)

Teddy Roosevelt

Ben-HurEd
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
